name: Martin Lipták
body:
I'm passionate about meeting people and improving their lives with technology. I like learning languages and traveling to foreign countries.

### What I have done

Probably more stuff is coming.

-   [VezmemeSa.sk](http://www.vezmemesa.sk)

    Leading (the only) wedding site provider in Slovakia.

-   [HladnýŠtudent.sk](http://www.hladnystudent.sk)

    Scratching my own itch. It daily parses websites of all student canteens in [Mill Valley](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mlynsk%C3%A1_dolina) and integrates all their menus. In Slovak.

-   [Statscrawler.com](http://www.statscrawler.com)

    Stats about frameworks, languages, servers and locations of a sample of 3.7 milion world domains.

-   [Štatistiky-domén.sk](http://www.statistiky-domen.sk)

    Stats about registrars, holders, frameworks, languages, servers and locations and trends of 260 thousand Slovak domains. In Slovak.

### Stuff from school

Probably more stuff is coming.

-   [Automated public data refining](https://martinliptak.files.wordpress.com/2012/05/vsetko.pdf)

    Bachelor's thesis. Goal to improve transparency in Slovakia accomplished (well, we have contributed our grain of sand, hope it will help). In Slovak.

-   [Using Trainable Duplicate Detection for Automated Public Data Refining](http://acmbulletin.fiit.stuba.sk/vol4num2/liptak.pdf)

    Research paper. Had to drink many beers to be able to write such a thing.

### Stay in touch

You can follow me on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/martinliptak) or check out my [blog](http://martinliptak.wordpress.com) (however, in Slovak).

Now, when you have finished reading, you can see [the electrocat](http://octodex.github.com/electrocat).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
